ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subgabl.h | |- H = ( G |`s S ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_submmnd | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_subcmn | |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ H e. Mnd ) -> H e. CMnd ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) -> H e. CMnd ) |
